Posts.Content: Sallyscotia wrote: In Jan 2012 I was diagnosed, In Mar I had surgery, right breast and lymp node dissection, end May started Chemo and then had 30 days of Raditation ending September 30 2012.  It was not a great time I found myself on the other side.   Now I am experience constant pain.  Armpit, shoulder and arm Some times is less intense while at other times it is almost not bearable.  Is anyone experiencing this? Any comments will be appreciated Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pain following treatment Sallyscotia Denise-G
